RibbonMenuButtonAutomationPeer Class

In this Article

Exposes RibbonMenuButton types to UI Automation.

Syntax

Declaration

public class RibbonMenuButtonAutomationPeer : System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemsControlAutomationPeer, System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IExpandCollapseProvider, System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ITransformProvider

Methods summary

CreateItemAutomationPeer(Object)

Creates a new RibbonMenuItemDataAutomationPeer for the specified item.
GetAccessKeyCore()

Gets the accelerator key combinations for the RibbonMenuButton that is associated with this RibbonMenuButtonAutomationPeer. This method is called by stem.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAccessKey*.

Gets the control type for the RibbonMenuButton that is associated with this RibbonMenuButtonAutomationPeer. This method is called by stem.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType*.

Gets the collection of child elements of the RibbonMenuButton that is associated with this RibbonMenuButtonAutomationPeer. This method is called by stem.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren*.

Gets the class name of the RibbonMenuButton that is associated with this RibbonMenuButtonAutomationPeer. This method is called by stem.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName*.

Gets the text that describes the functionality of the RibbonMenuButton that is associated with this RibbonMenuButtonAutomationPeer. This method is called by stem.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetHelpText*.
GetNameCore()

Gets the name that describes the element that is associated with this RibbonMenuButtonAutomationPeer. This method is called by stem.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetName*.
GetPattern(PatternInterface)

Gets the control pattern for the RibbonMenuButton that is associated with the RibbonMenuButtonAutomationPeer.

Explicit Interface Implementations

  • IExpandCollapseProvider.Collapse()

    Hides all items that are in the RibbonMenuButton that is associated with this RibbonMenuButtonAutomationPeer.

    void IExpandCollapseProvider.Collapse ();

    Exceptions

    • ElementNotEnabledException

      The RibbonMenuButton is not enabled.

    • InvalidOperationException

      The RibbonMenuButton does not contain any items.

    Remarks

    This member is an explicit interface member implementation. It can be used only when the RibbonMenuButtonAutomationPeer instance is cast to an IExpandCollapseProvider interface.
